item.title: Cheatsheet for Python Data Analysis
item.author: runqiyang@gmail.com (Runqi Yang)
item.description: It’s not just another cheatsheet. Here are most frequent and important methods in a machine learning project with CAUTIONS and TIPS. Some other useful tools, like bcolz and Jupyter notebook widgets, are also covered.

item.title: Machine Learing
item.author: runqiyang@gmail.com (Runqi Yang)
item.description: This post aims to share a list of notes (compiled by myself) on some important machine learning topics. Most of the concepts are mathematical, but after all, math is the most precise language!

item.author: runqiyang@gmail.com (Runqi Yang)
item.description: Runqi Yang (杨润琦) M.Sc. Student in Computer Science Nanjing University hitvoice runqiyang@gmail.com Biography I'm a third year M.Sc. student of Computer Science and Technology in Nanjing University. I received my B.Sc. degree in Electronic Science and Engineering in June 2016 from Nanjing University. In the same year, I was admitted to study for a M.Sc. degree without entrance examination. After graduation, I am going to work as an NLP engineer in Alime X Lab, Alibaba.
